alert.note: Alert for McCormick (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 3:51PM EDT until September 07 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Lincoln County in east central Georgia... Northern McCormick County in central South Carolina... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 351 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lincolnton, or 17 miles northeast of Washington, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... McCormick, Lincolnton, Mccormick County Airport, Elijah Clark State Park, Plum Branch, Hickory Knob State Resort Park, Bordeaux, Baker Creek State Park, Leroy`s Ferry Recreation Area, Willington, Curry Hill, Whitetown, Hawe Creek Campground, and Long Cane Creek Picnic Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Severe thunderstorms can produce large capsizing waves and frequent lightning. If on or near Lake Strom Thurmond move away from the water and take shelter!
